recentPerformance.seasonAverage: 11 rushing TDs in 9 games (1.22 per game)
recentPerformance.cushion: Elite goal-line usage in Packers' offense

keyFactors.title: Red-Hot TD Streak
keyFactors.description: Jacobs entered on a 5-game touchdown streak, scoring in every game since Week 5. With 11 rushing TDs in 9 games, he was one of NFL's most reliable RB scorers.

keyFactors.title: Workhorse Role
keyFactors.description: Jacobs commanded 78% of Packers' RB touches, averaging 21 carries per game. Clear bellcow back with no timeshare concerns in short-yardage situations.

keyFactors.title: Eagles' Run Defense Vulnerability
keyFactors.description: Philadelphia ranked 18th against the run (4.3 YPC allowed). Despite strong overall defense, they allowed goal-line TDs to feature backs.

riskFactors: Monday Night Football primetime environment could feature conservative game script
Cold weather at Lambeau Field might favor field goals over TDs
Jordan Love's rushing ability could vulture goal-line carries

quarterBreakdown.description: Scoreless defensive struggle through three quarters. Jacobs got heavy volume (16 carries for 52 yards through Q3) but Packers couldn't reach end zone.
TOUCHDOWN! Jacobs scored on 6-yard rushing TD with 5:54 remaining, cutting Eagles lead to 10-7. Extended TD streak to 6 straight games (11th rushing TD of season).
Jacobs fumbled on crucial 4th-and-1 at GB 44 with 1:30 left. Reed Blankenship forced fumble after Jaelan Phillips hit. Ended Packers' comeback attempt but TD already secured.

gameResults.gamePace: Historically low-scoring game (10-7 final) with first scoreless-at-halftime NFL game since December 2023. Defensive slugfest limited both offenses.

whatWentRight.title: TD Streak Extended to Six Games
whatWentRight.description: Jacobs scored his 11th rushing TD of the season, cashing the anytime TD prop despite the defensive grind. Only TD of game for Green Bay showed his goal-line dominance.

whatWentRight.title: Workhorse Volume Delivered
whatWentRight.description: 26 total touches (21 carries, 5 receptions) for 107 scrimmage yards. Jacobs dominated Packers' offensive touches in run-first game script.

whatWentRight.title: Late Fumble Didn't Matter
whatWentRight.description: While Jacobs fumbled on final drive with 1:30 left (ending comeback), the TD at 5:54 already secured this prop. Fumble was unfortunate but didn't affect bet outcome.

statisticalContext.percentileRanking: 85th percentile - scored only TD in low-scoring affair

closingLineValue.verdict: Positive CLV - line moved toward Jacobs TD as market recognized his hot streak.

keyTakeaways: TD streaks are real - Jacobs extended to 6 straight games with his 11th rushing TD
Workhorse backs deliver TDs even in low-scoring games - only 17 total points but Jacobs scored GB's lone TD
Late fumble was unfortunate but irrelevant to prop outcome - TD at 5:54 already cashed
Defensive games favor elite RB goal-line usage over QB/WR scores
-140 odds provided value given 6-game streak and 78% touch share
verdict: Perfect execution despite defensive slugfest. Jacobs' 6-game TD streak and workhorse role (26 touches) made this prop cash-worthy even in 10-7 game. The late fumble ended Packers' comeback but didn't affect bet outcome. Defensive game scripts favor elite RB goal-line work.
